all_text_content:
Verse of the Day
Be not ashamed, neither confounded; but be admonished in all your high-mindedness and pride, for it bringeth a snare upon your souls.
Doctrine and Covenants 90:17
Quote of the Day
"Ask through heartfelt prayer to Heavenly Father to feel closer to His Beloved Son."
President Henry B. Eyring | 1 Apr 2025General Conference
